Talon:

"You need rest"said Talon while she tried to help Tucson stood up"Just for 
few hours, and then we can try to bring back Nightlight to her normal being"
--------------------------------------------------
From: "Sandy" <magicquartz@...>
Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 2010 10:23 PM
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Subject: Re: The Awakening

> As Tucson tries to get up onto his feet, he suddenly finds that his body 
> has no strength to keep him up on his legs.  He falls onto his knees and 
> then catches himself with his hands.
>
> " Hmm..  I- think that's where I may need to go.  That - last action I 
> took, may have taken a toll on my battery system."
>

>>
>> > Tucson listens to Perceptor.  With a heavy heart and sympathy for
>> > Nightlight, he tries to sit up and then puts his feet onto the ground 
>> > for
>> > the first time since he had gone off line to rescue Rodimus. That spark 
>> > in
>> > his chest, the one that pulsated throughout the duration of the rescue,
>> > had not finished pulsating as yet.  He puts his hand on his chest, 
>> > sensing
>> > why and how he could have some of that spark left over after what he 
>> > had
>> > just gone through.  he turns his head over to Rodimus and gently puts a
>> > hand on his shoulder.
>> >
>> > " I won't sit here and watch Nightlight slip away from you.  After all,
>> > compassion has no end."
>> >
>> > He replies in what seems like a riddle of sorts.
>> >
>> > " Stanton, which room is Nightlight in?"
>> >
>> > Barely able to stand up, Tucson stumbles as he rights himself up on his
>> > feet.
>> >
>> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@> wrote:
>> >>
>> >> Rodimus Prime sat there on the bed listening carefully to Perceptor
>> >> and Kup as they spoke, especially Perceptor's confessions as to what
>> >> he had done to Nihtlight. He could not help but feel a stab of guilt
>> >> for his role in the whole thing. Yes he was under the control of the
>> >> Predacon shell program, but still he could feel guilt piercing him
>> >> like a white hot blade. For the moment he could say nothing, but the
>> >> anguish on his face spoke volumes!
>> >>
>> >> "What can be done to help her now?" Santon said as he looked at
>> >> Perceptor, a brief look of fear for Nightlight and discust for what
>> >> had happened to her flashing across his features. "How much damage do
>> >> you do to her?"
>> >>
>> >> Legacy, who had been standing in the shadows up to this time, looking
>> >> more like a weapon of war than doctor looked at Perceptor, his single
>> >> optic glowing brightly and steadily, his piercing gaze observing
>> >> Perceptor thoughtfully, "Perhaps she sould be brought here so that her
>> >> status can be ascertained?"
>> >>
>> >> Meanwhile Torca, who had been observing nodded to Tuscon, his great
>> >> horned head almost scraping the cieling as he advised them to wait
>> >> before they had thier briefing. "You are correct Tuscon." he said, his
>> >> deep voice filling the room. "I shall wait for a short time. However
>> >> the council's message will not wait long."
>> >>
>> >> Torca turned to leave, he could see Silverbolt standing just outside
>> >> the medical chamber still looking through the glass. He had left
>> >> Silverbolt in charge of the Fuzors while he had been away, now it was
>> >> time to catch up.
>> >>
>> >> He stepped out of the and into the observation room, "Silverbolt."
>> >> Torca said as he moved his large bulk through the doorway followed by
>> >> Bantor. "It has been some time."
>> >>
>> >> (TAG)
>> >>
>> >> Preston
>> >>
>> >> (OOC: Keep in mind Torca is leader of the Fuzors here at the moment
>> >> and a high ranking general)
>> >> http://www.tfu.info/1998/Maximal/Bantor/bantor.htm
>> >> http://www.tfu.info/1998/Maximal/Torca/torca.htm
>> >>
